metadata.dc:author: Salcedo Abizanda, S
Plaja Román, P
Llorens Fores, A
Panadés Siurana, M J
Carreño Pedemonte, J C
Yeste Fernández, D
Aizpurúa Galdeano, P
metadata.dc:description: Authors report three cases of congenital mesoblastic nephroma. In two of them, diagnosis was neonatal, while the third was made at the 3rd-month. They discuss diagnostic procedures employed as well as pathological findings. Presence of a mass was the first clinical sign in all three cases. Nephrectomy was the only treatment employed, with favourable outcome.
metadata.dc:title: Nefroma mesoblástico congénito.
[Congenital mesoblastic nephroma].
